111.content:
Dick stared at the ceiling, nervous out his mind. He could barely see anything, but he could still make out basic features. He turned his head to both sides. The room was spacious, with a little desk next to the comfortable bed he was on. He didn't know where he was. And even worse, with who. The last thing he remembered was doing a routine check of Gotham with Barman. Their was a break in at the museum, and Catwoman was their. One minute you're fighting Catwoman and holding your own, the next your out like a light bulb.

         â€œWell...well...well, look who finally decided to wake up. That kick to the head put you out like a light. Well at any rate, Batman will be looking for you so I might as well enjoy your company while I can." She told you, sitting down on the bed next to your shackled legs.

         â€œWhat's gonna happen? I thought we were cool and all." Dick complained. He then noticed a cat statue in the corner of the room. That's stolen, he thought.

         â€œOh we are cool, I just like having fun and tonight you're going to be the source. No hard feelings though." She said with a little too much excitement in her voice. Dick then saw Catwoman unzip her left latex boot. The room was quickly filled with noxious odor. It made Catwoman cover her nose, but since Dick couldn't cover his nose, he was left defenseless. Dick thrashed as if doing that would help him, in anyway.

         â€œUgh, That's ripe. I'm glad I'm not you right now." Catwoman teased. She flexed her black painted toes through her stockings. Dick was transfixed by her feet. He couldn't take his eyes off them. Catwoman, the ever observant one, saw where his gaze was and grew a smirk. She also noticed Dick sniffing ever so slight as not to get caught. She decided to play a game with him.

         â€œRobbie poo aren't you supposed to help people. My feet are sooo are from running around so much in my size 8 boots. Do you think you could give me a nice foot massage? " Catwoman asked flexing her foot. Size 8, he thought in disbelief.

         â€œI would love to help you, but I'm kind of tied up at the moment." Dick replied. Catwoman then got this wicked grin.

         â€œThat's okay, I only need your face." She said raising her slender foot in the air, yet in your vision range. She had long toes with a nice arch. "Robin, I just love when you analyze my feet. Like they're an object of worship. Well let me help you." And slowly but sure her feet got closer to his face. As they were almost touching his face, he could tell they were covered in sweat. A few droplets even fell on his face. "Oops. I didn't think going to the gym for 4 hours and not washing before going out would do this to my feet," she said sarcastically. And finally her foot closed the distance between it and his face.

Your senses were flooded. Your body didn't know whether to fetch from the smell or soak it up lovingly. And it didn't help with her rubbing her sweaty foot all over your face. But something soon sparked in you. With her toes around Dick's nose, he took a deep breath and he enjoyed it, even though it left him kind of light headed.

         â€œWhoa slow down Dick, you'll have plenty of time to smell my feet. For now small breaths." She instructed. And he complied. Catwoman stared on as Robin was actually enjoying her feet. Her feet. Not even Bruce could stand her feet like this and here was someone who could not only tolerate it but love it. She giggled wondering what Batgirl would do if she had this knowledge.
111.title: Cat Woman

1111.content:
â€œWell since you like that foot so much, why don't I introduced you to its best friend." She said with a grin. Robin heard a thump as he couldn't see with Catwoman's luscious foot in his face. The air grew staler, but Dick didn't care. He absolutely loved it.

         â€œWow, this one is even worse. I swear I just saw some steam come out my boot. I hope you enjoy this one as much as that one." And with that Catwoman sealed the deal and placed her right foot on his face.

         The acrid stench returned to Dick in full strength. He breathed in long deep breaths. His face glistening with sweat.

         "This is so purfect right now. You don't know the stress of robbing 2 people in one night. Maybe we can make this a daily thing, like once or twice a month." She said playing with Robin's cheeks. When he didn't respond, she brushed her feet off in his hair and pulled, lightly, with her toes and in the process drying off her sweaty feet. Dick helped but not much as from that. He'd been conditioned to fight through pain.

         "Pay attention next time. This is for YOUR benefit and my enjoyment. " She scolded. "Now say your sorry, or this foot session is over."

         "I'm so sorry Catwoman. I'll play attention. I promise." Dick quickly blurted out. Catwoman smirked, but hide it ever so slyly.

         "Not to me. My feet. Make it up to them." Catwoman then looked up in thought. "Matter fact, kiss them." Dick contemplated this. Barman always told him stay vigilant and never let enemies know your weakness, but was Catwoman an enemy or friend. He could never decide.

         "Good job, Dick you chose the right choice." Dick realized he had unintentionally been kissing her feet. Her soft feet left a sweaty and tart taste in his mouth, yet there was a sweet aftertaste. So Dick continued, planting kisses on her heel and on the soft wrinkles of her instep. Catwoman was getting more and more relaxed. She hasn't felt this good since her last full body massage in Sweden last summer. She never knew her feet were so sensitive. She let out a loud sigh.

         Almost on the verge a sleep, a soft moan escaped her lips. She blushed and looked down at Robin as he had a grin on his face. She stiffened his next move, he lightly and not to painfully bit her heel.

         "Next time ask before you do something like that." Catwoman said trying to sound in control but was obviously failing. Robin didn't buy into her ploy so Catwoman clamped his nose shut. And after a few seconds let go, releasing Robin to smell right in between her rank toes. The part he had never touched. He sighed and smelled deeper in between her toes. He smelt all her toes, laying gentle kisses on them as well.

         â€œThis is nice and all but I'm afraid our time is escaping us so let's move on to something a little more....fun."She said commanding Robin while also raising her feet off his face for a few seconds. He noted her red and yellow polished toes.
1111.title: The Case of the Robin

Cuando termino harley volvio a apretar, los musculos se tensaban bajo el Latex y Robin solo pensaba en tortura, dolor y humillacion, era lo que se le venia a la cabeza en todo momento, introdujo sus dedos en los interiores de los muslos para evitar mas presion pero las piernas de Harley eran tan temibles que solo redujo el dolor en un 5%

115.content:
Alright, here are the three options I came up with for Batman: TAS, for Boy Wonder to contend with. Batman: TAS is one of my favorite shows, definitely on my top five, and a major reason for that is the villains. Not just your usual baddies like the Joker or the Penguin, but I appreciate that the creators for the show really dug down deep into his comic book roots to pull us lesser known villains, the folks who haven't been properly introduced to the mainstream public. They introduced a few ones written exclusively for the show like Harley Quinn, and even re-invented a few veterans like Mr. Freeze. Bottom line, this show ranks among the greatest animated shows ever produced, and a major aspect of the show's legacy were the villains, both female and male. This story branch will mostly tackle the henchwomen of these villains, as the show's main female cast were covered in the earlier story. Note that these characters will be represented both physically and mentally through their Batman: TAS roots, mostly during their featured episodes. Also, if you haven't seen the episodes featuring these women, I would highly recommend that you do so. Some of my stories might offer an alternative twist to their episodes, only this time things'll turn out a bit differently.
I will add two perspectives to each women's arc. It will be an alternative twist to their episode in the animated series as well as a new story chronicling their battle with Robin after the episode. The alternative episode ending stories will take place right snack dab into the episode itself, so watching the episode would be good so you would know about the various plot devices or characters introduced.

Thanks, batman1

135311.content:
Dick Grayson, also known as Robin when in the Titans Tower, quickly awoke to find himself in a pink room. Looking at his clothing, or lack of it, he could see that he was only wearing white boxer shorts and a bright pink collar with a red circle right at the centre of said collar, Robin noticed that his mask was missing as well and rushed to find a way to hide his identity.

"I wouldn't do that, if I were you." A high-pitched female voice instructed, Robin freezing up when he heard it and realising who it belonged to. "I already know who you are Robbie-poo, or should I say Dickie-boo?

"Kitten" He said, teeth gritted as the memories of Killer Moth and her own actions came flooding into his head, he now remembered what had happened. Kitten had tried to bust her dad out of prison and the Titans had to head over there to stop her, the battle was going well enough until Kitten got a lucky shot in and managed to knock him out.

Her face looked like a mixture of sadness, anger and smug superiority, probably from failing to save her father but managing to discover something about Robin that no one else knew, and he had the feeling that she was going to be milking the knowledge she had for all that it was worth.

Robin took a submissive tone, hoping that she might pity him. "Kitten, you can't give out that information, it would put a lot of people in danger and could ruin lives." Bruce would be found out alongside him (how else would Dick have been able to avoid attention for so long?) and then it would do a lot of damage to the Justice League in keeping loved ones safe from the inevitable attacks by villains.

No matter her demands, he would have to meet them.

Knowing this, Kitten was now looking like she was considering something. "Let's see, you refuse to go out with me, you threw my daddy in jail, you've attacked me repeatedly and now you want me to do something for you? I don't think so."

"Fine, I'll go out with you." He'd explain things to the team, they would easily understand and then he could have a memory-wipe arranged.

"Oh no, Robin, I don't want you as a boyfriend. I want you as my loyal slave." Kitten smirked as she said this, pulling out a controller and pressing a button on it. The collar Robin was wearing activated and gave him a powerful shock, screams of pain being heard across the room, he fell to his knees as Kitten maniacally laughed at his suffering.

Her thumb left the button and Robin struggled to not fall completely to the ground after his torture had ended. It was clear that, with the blackmail over his identity mixed in with the physical torture that could be used, he was Kitten's bitch and both of them knew it.

"Now then Robin," Kitten started with a sickly sweet tone. "I think it's time for you to beg for my love and mercy as my slave, I might even think about it if you start kissing my feet."

Robin grimaced, Kitten had a pair of spartan sandals on and her feet did look alright, but it was the humiliation of begging and kissing them that made his stomach turn. However, it was for the greater good that he listened to the demands of Kitten, unless he wanted innocent people to get hurt.

He bowed his head in submission, certain that Kitten was smiling. "Please, Mistress Kitten, have mercy on me for everything that I've done to you. I'll do anything to show you my love for you." Robin lowered his head and pressed his lips onto Kitten's right foot, giving them light kisses in the hopes of not doing this for long.

Kitten's other foot rested on the back of his head and pushed it down, forcing him to kiss her foot deeper and longer, he even felt his tongue touch the top of her feet. She was laughing even harder, mocking him as he did this, sitting down on a nearby chair as if it was her throne.

"Now, what to do with you? Should I have you pamper my feet further, or should I invite some other girls I know to play around with you?" She considered the question before making a decision. "I know!"

1521.title: Which Robin

info.brief_description: Robin is forced to serve the ladies of the DC Universe
info.description:
Which universe (DCAU, Young Justice or the Comics) is being used will be chosen from the opening chapter.

1. Apart from toilet stuff (scat and fart) and male domination, anything goes. Anything including those two things will be deleted.
2. Character death is allowed
3. Make sure your chapter has at least two possibilities (except for an end chapter). Just use "something else" if you can't think of anything better
4. Chapters must have more than two lines of text, with the exception of choice chapters, anything less than a decent paragraph is getting deleted
5. Good writing, not going to be a grammar nazi, but make it readable or it will be edited or deleted, depending on the number of noticeable mistakes.
6. You can change which female is dominating Robin but give an option to maintain the current dominator when you're creating the chapter for the change e.g. when creating a Poison Ivy to Harley Quinn dominating Robin plot, include an option to keep Ivy in.
7. Robin, in this story, is referring to Dick Grayson (Google if you don't know who he is) unless another option is given e.g. Jason Todd or Tim Drake.
